Mathematics, Physics and

Physics, Chemistry 
and Mathematics  
  
DIRECT ENTRY  
(i) BELLS accepts   
(a) two (2) ‘A’ level passes in Mathematics and Physics  
(b) ND upper credit in Computer Science.   
(ii) OAU as for Computer Engineering.  
  
UTME  
(i) AUN same as in Software Engineering.  
(ii) BELLS requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes in English 
Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Physics, 
Economics/ Geography/ Biology. ‘O’ level pass in 
Chemistry is acceptable.  
(iii) OAU as for Computer Engineering.  
(iv) RENAISSNCE requires Economics.
